summary: A Replacement for Warmaidens, a Mod for Smiths!
descriptionHtml:
The Rams Helm is a replacer mod for Warmaidens. Obviously this means it will get rid of Warmaidens from Whiterun. I'm not making this with any Whiterun altering mods installed, so it may not work with
anything other than Vanilla Whiterun.So far no conflicts with Hearthfire, Dawnguard, or Dragonborn installed in the game itself. I do not know what mods could make conflicts.

The new update -1.0- contains quite a few updates to the interior and exterior. It also add's a StrongBox within the Counter in the "Lobby" in the side of the Store. Within are areoun 2K Septims, to be "Store Profits" and a Key for the place if it ever locks. I took out the front entrence entirely and replaced it with a wall on the interior and borded it up on the exterior, also blocked it with a rock heh.. The bedroom was converted to storage, the dining room was converted to the Lobby, and the Crafting Stations remain the same.

--This mod, as far as I can tell, DOES remove Ulfberth War-Bear and Adrianne Avenicci from the game entirely, I've only tested this mod twice so I'm 50/50 on that.--

---------------------------------------------

**THIS MOD IS DONE! I LOST A MAJOR UPDATE TOO IT BEFORE I COULD RELEASE IT A WHILE BACK, AND HAVE LOST INTEREST IN COMPLETING THIS MOD. I WILL HOWEVER START A NEW SHOP, THAT WILL NOT BE A REPLACER WHEN ABLE**
author: Hoku
